data.message:
Hello Facebook!
I created a group that was taken away from me. I am not the administrator of the group, but i founded it. How can i get it back? Thanks

replies.message:
Hi Hárich. If you've lost access to a group you admin, it may be because one of the other group admins removed you as an admin. Try sending a message to the other admins to add you back.
If you think you lost access because of an error. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2jIW2hs. -Elizabeth
